description.brief: low level api and firmware utilities
description.p: The ecl-lite stack includes packages with few dependencies on either system or c++ functionality. This makes it ideal for very embedded builds where many of the usual mechanisms are unavailable.
It also includes a few packages which standardise lower level api (e.g. posix/win32) with drop-ins to make them properly cross-platform,
